comment.author: Emily
comment.text: According to the history of your country you should become the next president, no matter what will happen, no one can stop history, I wish you well, but continue to hammer vigorously. Don't forget there wore 350000 women in US against the vote for women. Happy Halloween and wish you a landscape VICTORY

replies.author: Kendra
replies.text: I hope Hillary rots in prison for the rest of her pathetic soulless life! She's not only a disgrace to women but all Americans
